newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks steady to lower.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks steady to lower.

text.p: Croatian stocks were steady to lower on Thursday, with new losses among most hoteliers.
* Of ten active issues, one rose, five fell and four were flat.
* Turnover was halved at 5.4 million kuna, volume also lower at 4,578 units.
* Hotelier Rivier Porec was the only gainer, adding 10 kuna to close at 230, with 30 shares sold.
* Another hotelier Jadranturist was the biggest loser, down 60 kuna to 280 on volume of 404 shares.
* Food processor Podravka was the most active issue with 1,469 units traded, inching down 50 lipa to 268 kuna.
